your_city: Enter your city/town or use the button below to share your location 📍
send_photo: Send a photo to add to your profile (max. 3).
change_language_from_keyboard:
Please choose a language from the keyboard below


🇺🇦 🇵🇱 🇬🇧 🇩🇪 🇪🇸 🇫🇷 🇮🇹
name: Name
hide_my_profile_text:
If you confirm this action, your profile will disappear from search results until you enable this function again.
To confirm, press the button below!
age_lower_14: You cannot register if you are under 14 years old
age_more_: You cannot register if you are over 90 years old
questionnaire_successfull_created: The questionnaire has been successfully created 😎
our_rules_text:
Please read our terms at the link:
[Terms](https://example.com/rules)
first_time_start_welcome_text:
Welcome! 🎉

We are happy to see you in our dating bot!

🚀 Here you will find many useful features that will make your life more convenient and exciting.

✨ Let's begin this exciting journey together!
help_text:
👋 Hello! I am your assistant in this bot. Here is what I can do for you:

🔹 Search for information and useful resources
🔹 Set up your profile and personalization
🔹 Help with tasks
🔹 Answer frequently asked questions

If you didn’t find what you were looking for, just write to me, and I’ll be happy to assist you! 😊

Feel free to contact me at any time! 💬
name_too_long: The name is too long. Maximum 20 characters
premium_description_text:
🎉 Welcome to the world of exclusive opportunities! Premium subscription opens up:

✨ **Unlimited matchmaking** — more chances to find exactly who you’re looking for!
💬 **Priority in chats** — get more attention and faster replies from potential partners.
🔒 **Enhanced security** — your data and activity will be safe as Premium users have additional privacy settings.
🌟 **Exclusive communication features** — access to special chat and photo gallery functions.
🎁 **Bonuses and gifts** — regular promotions and discounts for Premium users!

Forget about limitations and get the most out of every match!

Subscribe to **Premium** and unlock new horizons in the world of dating!
tarif_plans:
Choose one of our tariff plans 🚀
Pick your plan below.
premium_lotery_enter:
Lottery menu 😎😎😎

You can participate in the lottery once a day.

If you win, the premium is automatically credited to you for 24 hours
unknown_answer: This answer does not exist. Please choose one of the options!
profile_is_disabled: Your profile is inactive because you turned off search visibility. To activate it, press the button below.
profile_is_active:
Your profile is now active.


Enjoy your experience 🫡😎
system_something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. There might be server issues. Try again later
system_next_steps:
Complete the registration to start using the bot 🥰🥰🥰

Adventures await you 🤪
incorrect_min_age: Incorrect minimum age for search. Only numbers!
incorrect_max_age: Incorrect maximum age for search. Only numbers
max_age_for_partner: Enter the maximum age for profiles in search
min_age_for_partner: Enter the minimum age for profiles in search

You indicated that you are {{your_age}}. Therefore, you cannot search for profiles younger than 16 years old.

Please provide the correct age

This is how your profile looks. Shall we proceed with matchmaking?

private_profile_data: Personal data not visible to other users:
profile_description_add_text: Tell us about yourself, your hobbies, what you do, whether you work, study, etc.
incorect_city: Unfortunately, we couldn't find the location you provided. Try entering another place or check the spelling.
query_sent_to_admin: Your message has been successfully delivered to the administrator.
age_mismatch_max_lower_min: The maximum search age cannot be lower than the minimum search age.
want_add_another_photo: Do you want to add another photo?
final_step:
This is how your profile will look.
Shall we continue?
Or do you want to fill it out again?
